overview: Series of 32 10-minute episodes, in which each episode corresponds to the adaptation of an illustrated album from the editorial catalog of OQO editora. Aimed at a target from 4 to 9 years old, this series has the collaboration of prestigious animators from different countries, who make Never Ending Tales an original proposal, which brings us closer to stories from around the world through different plastic and musical manifestations.
title: Never Ending Tales
